feed.title: Dynamic Brain & Memory Lab
feed.subtitle: The official website of the Brain & Memory Lab at the National University of Singapore (NUS), led by Principal Investigator Dr. Jia-Hou Poh.

entry.title: Dr. Poh’s review paper published on the Annual Reviews of Psychology!

link.title: Dr. Poh’s review paper published on the Annual Reviews of Psychology!

entry.content:
Check out Dr. Poh and Dr. Adcock's review paper on how motivational states engender distinct neural contexts for adaptive memory.

Read "Motivation as Neural Context for Adaptive Learning and Memory Formation" on Annual Reviews of Psychology here!
entry.summary: Check out Dr. Poh and Dr. Adcock's review paper on how motivational states engender distinct neural contexts for adaptive memory.

entry.title: The dynamic brain and memory lab is live!
